name: Cardiology
details: Cardiology is a branch of medicine that deals with the disorders of the heart as well as some parts of the circulatory system.

name: corona (covid 19)
details: Most people who fall sick with COVID-19 will experience mild to moderate symptoms and recover without special treatment. However, some will become seriously ill and require medical attention.

name: Opthalmology
details: Ophthalmology is a branch of medicine and surgery that deals with the diagnosis and treatment of disorders of the eye.

name: Hematology
details: Cardiology is a branch of medicine that deals with the disorders of the heart as well as some parts of the circulatory system.

name: Oncology
details: Oncology is a branch of medicine that deals with the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of cance.

name: Psychiatry
details: If someone you care about is undergoing lots of stress and shows signs of anxiety and depression.
